vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παρασκευάζω,
future -άσω[Refs 5th c.BC+] (but 3rd.pers. singular -σκευᾷ[Refs 4th c.BC+], 2nd pers. plural -σκευᾶτε[Refs 4th c.BC+]: Ionic dialect 3rd.pers. plural pluperfect passive παρεσκευάδατο [Refs 5th c.BC+]: later sometimes παρασκεάζω, as παρεσκεασμένων [Refs 3rd c.BC+]:—
vocabInfos.shortDef: (act.) to prepare; (mid.) to get ready; (middle/passive) to be ready
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(act.) to prepare; (mid.) to get ready; (middle/passive) to be ready
to prepare, make ready, 2Cor. 9:2, 3; middle to prepare one's self, put one's self in readiness, Acts 10:10; 1Cor. 14:8*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: preparar una comida ; voz media: prepararse, alistarse (pf. estar preparado, listo)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sẵn sàng; chuẩn bị sẵn sàng
